client.models

Class Proxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.models.Proxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProxy

    public class Proxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IProxy
    The Proxy class acts as a proxy for the real server and has similar methods that are found on the server. There are three doPost methods. One is for logging in with no cookie headers. Then the second is for joining a game. Then the last is for all subsequent post calls.
    Author:
    scottdaly
